item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - REBELDE (MEXICO) SEASON 1-3 [HDTV 1080i/720Rip SBT Extended]
item.description:
Hey,
Does anyone have REBELDE SEASON 1,2,3 in HDTV 1080i Upscaled, 720pRip from SBT (2014 rerun, first broadcast in sd)
Portuguese Brazil audio.

Can't watch the poor DVD edit, its missing a thousand parts.
The cut of the Canada ep is ridiculous, the nerve they had to do that way, I could punch the bitch who edited that scenes.

Why wasn't the extended version released on DVD in Brazil? I still don't know what the collector's version with 39 DVDs is like, even so it only has Spanish audio without subtitles. I like the dubbed version from Brazil.

UMG/Televisa sucks, they should reissue a special box with all the seasons in TV version + Bluray upscaled.


HELP ME pleease!!
item.author: SCANDAL
